name: Software Developer for Sustainability Full Curriculum (EQF Level 5)
description: Full curriculum for Software Developer for Sustainability at EQF Level 5
program_learning_outcomes: Apply fundamental digital sustainability principles and methodologies in structured environments
Utilize appropriate tools and technologies to support sustainability objectives in digital contexts
Demonstrate awareness of ethical and environmental implications of digital systems and decisions
Communicate sustainability concepts and practices effectively with diverse stakeholders
Implement basic sustainability improvements in digital systems and processes
Design and develop digital systems with sustainability principles embedded throughout the engineering lifecycle

modules.name: Advanced Sustainability Impact Assessment Methods
modules.description: Cutting-edge methodologies for sustainability impact measurement
learning_outcomes: Evaluate advanced methodologies for sustainability impact assessment.
Critically analyze the strengths and limitations of different impact measurement approaches.
Design innovative assessment frameworks for complex sustainability challenges.

modules.name: Advanced Sustainability Impact Assessment Methods
modules.description: Cutting-edge methodologies for sustainability impact measurement
learning_outcomes: Evaluate advanced methodologies for sustainability impact assessment.
Critically analyze the strengths and limitations of different impact measurement approaches.
Design innovative assessment frameworks for complex sustainability challenges.

modules.name: Advanced Sustainability Impact Assessment Methods
modules.description: Cutting-edge methodologies for sustainability impact measurement
learning_outcomes: Evaluate advanced methodologies for sustainability impact assessment.
Critically analyze the strengths and limitations of different impact measurement approaches.
Design innovative assessment frameworks for complex sustainability challenges.

modules.name: Advanced Sustainability Impact Assessment Methods
modules.description: Cutting-edge methodologies for sustainability impact measurement
learning_outcomes: Evaluate advanced methodologies for sustainability impact assessment.
Critically analyze the strengths and limitations of different impact measurement approaches.
Design innovative assessment frameworks for complex sustainability challenges.

modules.name: Digital Sustainability Principles
modules.description: Core principles and frameworks for digital sustainability
learning_outcomes: Recognize sustainability principles for sustainable business practices
Explain how digital sustainability approaches contributes to organizational sustainability goals in digital transformation for sustainability
Acknowledge the ethical considerations and stakeholder impacts of digital sustainability principles decisions
Demonstrate proficiency in digital sustainability principles through project-based assessments and practical applications

modules.name: Green IT Workplace Experience
modules.description: Supervised practical experience in sustainable IT environments
learning_outcomes: Illustrate digital sustainability approaches for sustainable business practices
Implement effective sustainable technology practices approaches to solve sustainability problems for addressing environmental challenges
Use solutions that balance environmental, social, and economic considerations in practical scenarios
Participate the ethical considerations and stakeholder impacts of green it workplace experience decisions
Demonstrate proficiency in green it workplace experience through project-based assessments and practical applications

modules.name: Introduction to Green IT
modules.description: Basic concepts of environmentally sustainable IT practices
learning_outcomes: Illustrate sustainability principles in digital transformation for sustainability
Recognize how environmental impact reduction strategies contributes to organizational sustainability goals to support sustainable development goals
Follow the ethical considerations and stakeholder impacts of introduction green it decisions
Demonstrate proficiency in introduction green it through project-based assessments and practical applications

modules.name: Sustainable Software Development
modules.description: Practices for developing environmentally efficient software
learning_outcomes: Illustrate sustainable coding practices for addressing environmental challenges
Demonstrate effective energy-efficient software development approaches to solve sustainability problems in digital transformation for sustainability
Apply software solutions that minimize environmental impact while maintaining performance
Participate the ethical considerations and stakeholder impacts of sustainable software development decisions
Demonstrate proficiency in sustainable software development through project-based assessments and practical applications

modules.name: Energy-Efficient Computing Fundamentals
modules.description: Basic approaches to reducing energy consumption in computing
learning_outcomes: Outline digital sustainability approaches in digital transformation for sustainability
Illustrate how environmental impact reduction strategies contributes to organizational sustainability goals in organizational sustainability contexts
Demonstrate effective sustainability principles approaches to solve sustainability problems in organizational sustainability contexts
Apply solutions that balance environmental, social, and economic considerations in practical scenarios
Acknowledge the ethical considerations and stakeholder impacts of energy-efficient computing fundamentals decisions
Demonstrate proficiency in energy-efficient computing fundamentals through project-based assessments and practical applications

Apply solutions that balance environmental, social, and economic considerations in practical scenarios
Acknowledge the ethical considerations and stakeholder impacts of sustainable it tools decisions
Demonstrate proficiency in sustainable it tools through project-based assessments and practical applications
